name: To The Roof (Alpha)
description:
A don't fall game like getting over it but including puzzles. There are no checkpoints so if you fall to the bottom you must retry you also cannot save so if the game is closed all progress is lost. This is a very early release of the game which may include bugs things not textured properly and sounds incorrectly lining up! Please enjoy!

This was made using Gdevelop 5 and Gdevelop assets with no importing of assets from outside sources!

This game also includes a lofi soundtrack to make sure the game is chill while completing puzzles! There is not much content as of yet but many updates should come in the future!
